Content: you just need enough utxos that they are always elegible to mine a block ... it take 100 blocks after a utxo finds a block

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: or you can invalidateblock on all nodes 110 blocks behind

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then send funds to more than 1 address and more than 100 utxos

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if the entire chain has less than 100 utxos, it is guaranteed to stall a 100% PoS chain

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: think about it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if it needs 100 blocks to mature and there are less than 100 utxo....

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: or make it 99% PoS, then you can always mine if things get stuck

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it would be good if the documentation makes a special warning about 100% PoS chains. It is assumed that any 100% PoS chain will have some sort of distribution and not be all in one utxo

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: PoS chains are vulnerable in the early days, totally unlike PoW chains
